The British squad scored its first WRC win since Rally GB in 2018 as Sebastien Loeb and co-driver Isabelle Galmiche managed to hold off Toyotas Sebastien Ogier after an intense four-day battle.

articles.author: Adam Brown
articles.title: Liverpool goalkeeper Alisson's 10/10 performance secures win at Crystal Palace - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Liverpool scored three goals to beat Crystal Palace, but the result could have been very different were it not for Alisson's goalkeeping heroics.
articles.content:
Liverpool scored three goals against Crystal Palace but the result could have been very different were it not for Alisson. DANIEL LEAL/AFP via Getty Images
